artist: Larsen Design Studio; Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description:
Linen arp & weft with some metallic weft.  Open weave. Natural linen & metallic gold warp and weft.  Gold forms border.  Machine stitched all 4 edges.  Staled to same 8.5x11" card as 99.1.1206.7. "H-4 and 
D-86 written on card. (Natural, metallic  gold)
title: Leverlin
